item.title: Omg i learned how to lucid dream!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

I hate you … I’ve been trying to acheive it for some time now. It’d be aweomse, you’re in your own world where you can do anything and everything.

I almost did it last night, except i woke up. The hardest part for me is knowing your in the dream, and remembering to remember that you were just in your bed. But i did that once and woke up straight away.

Read full topic
item.source: Omg i learned how to lucid dream!

item.title: Omg i learned how to lucid dream!
item.dc:creator: @animefreak animefreak
item.description:
@animefreak wrote:

when you lucid dream you can control your dreams, as long as you keep rembering your just dreaming and dont think of getting murdered(sadly i have dont this) then you wont get paralysed. and even so the paralysis is only temporary, its like the feeling you have when you wake up from a bad nightmere. jme about last month i had a lucid dream and i have almost perfected getting them.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 20, 2006, 11:58:08 PM[/size][hr]im going to bed soon, ill post tomorrow if i get it.

Read full topic
item.source: Omg i learned how to lucid dream!

item.title: Omg i learned how to lucid dream!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“I_love_j00, post:10, topic:19228”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=29207.msg335613#msg335613 date=1161423948]
I made a thread about it long ago.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I can safely say that I’ve nearly mastered lucid dreaming. Also, you don’t just read up about it on wikipedia, then magically learn how. It takes weeks/months of dedication just to get your first hard earned lucid dream. You can’t even control the dream until you really get good at it.
[/quote]
Jme_009 I accidently had a lucid dream.I didn’t mean it but now i can have them on cue.Really funny how i work.But lucid dreams Arn’t funny.They could cause serious health disabiltys becuase when you are going through the REM stages your body goes like sorta nuts…If you are awake will that’s fun? You could die.[/quote]

You are poorly uneducated. Please research your facts before commenting something that has been practiced for centuries. [br][size=1]Posted at: October 20, 2006, 11:55:38 PM[/size][hr]Also, when you get paralised, that’s sleep paralysis. It’ll go away though, and your really only half awake then. I’ve only gotten it twice.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg i learned how to lucid dream!
item.dc:creator: @animefreak animefreak
item.description:
@animefreak wrote:

ok if you dont know what a lucid dream is go

en.wikipedia.org

Lucid dream

A lucid dream is a dream during which the dreamer is aware that they are dreaming. During a lucid dream, the dreamer may gain some amount of control over the dream characters, narrative, and environment; however, this is not actually necessary for a dream to be described as lucid. The term 'lucid dream' was coined by Dutch author and psychiatrist Frederik van Eeden in his 1913 article A Study of Dreams, though descriptions of dreamers being aware that they are dreaming predates the actual term....


it is soo awsome you can control your dreams!!!

Read full topic
